revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=B-LINK |model=BL-MP01 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/21/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=X2NBL-MP01 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=USB Micro-B (female) |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT5350F |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=PMC |fla1_model=Pm25LQ032 |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-6T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5350F |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=portable |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=BL-MP01-XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BL-MP01-[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.16.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=20:F4:1B |oui_eth= }} The default SSID pattern appears to be '''BL-MP01-XXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' :is the last three octets of the BSSID (upper case letters).
Flash: ''PMC'' (now ''Chingis'', part of ''ISSI'') Pm25LQ032 4MB (32Mb) :''Chingis Technology'' PM25LQ032 [http://www.chingistek.com/img/Product_Files/Pm25LQ032C%20datasheet%20v1.6.1.pdf Datasheet] :newer generation flash, with 4KB sectors and 32KB blocks
